se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.command
Class SleepCommand

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.command.CommandMessage
      se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.command.SleepCommand

public class SleepCommand
extends CommandMessage

Command to make the Sphero go to sleep for a given number of seconds. NOTICE: Sending this command will result in a lost connection to the Sphero as the Bluetooth connection is closed down after the sleep state is entered

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin, nicklas.gavelin@gmail.com, Lule√• University of Technology
